title: Zohran Mamdani wins the New York mayoral race
author: jsheard
aiHeadline: Zohran Mamdani takes the crown as New York's mayor, proving that sometimes, change is just a different flavor of the same old thing.

title: Solarpunk is happening in Africa
author: JoiDegn
aiHeadline: Solarpunk isn't just a genre anymore—Africa's leading the charge into a sustainable future, while the rest of us are still figuring out how to unplug our phones.

title: YouTube erased more than 700 videos documenting Israeli human rights violations
author: rzk
aiHeadline: YouTube deletes over 700 videos about Israeli human rights violations, because nothing says 'free speech' like selectively silencing uncomfortable truths.

title: I’m worried that they put co-pilot in Excel
author: isaacfrond
aiHeadline: Co-pilot gets a new seat—in Excel. Because clearly, we needed AI to help us with our spreadsheets, and nothing else was more important.

title: Direct File won't happen in 2026, IRS tells states
author: jhatax
aiHeadline: IRS tells states to forget about Direct File in 2026, because waiting until the last minute is a tradition, not a problem.
